name: @sparkpost/fixture-interface
description: A simple interface to make helpers for setting up and tearing down data needed for tests.

scripts.chk-changelog: grep `node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version);'` CHANGELOG.md || (echo 'Please update CHANGELOG.md with your updates'; exit 255)

author: @Sparkpost

hooks.pre-push: npm run docs -- && git add DOCUMENTATION.md && if git commit --no-verify -m "`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` Updated Documentation"; then exit 0; else echo 'No documentation updates'; fi
